full_text: The difference between 1.5°C and 2°C of warming would wipe away the livelihoods of millions. The differences between 2°C and 3°C are far starker https://t.co/XPO13ePVwq

localize.full_text: 1.5℃と2℃の温暖化の差は、何百万人もの人々の生活を一掃します。2℃と3℃の差ははるかに激しい https://t.co/XPO13ePVwq
